verbLexeme: 1. To have something which causes you a lot of worry or hard work; to be burdened with something.
2. To carry something heavy on your shoulders; to carry a burden.
nominalLexeme: 1. Something which causes you a lot of worry or hard work. English = burden.
2. A heavy load that is difficult to carry. English = burden.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: carrying a burden on one's shoulders.
